game.name: The Wraith of the Galaxy
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Strategy, Early Access
game.shortDescription: The Wraith of the Galaxy — 3인칭 시점의 우주 전투 게임. 외계인들이 행성 전체에서 실험을 하기 위해 우주를 점령했습니다. 그들을 파괴하지 않으면 그들이 당신을 파괴할 것입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Wraith of the Galaxy is a third-person space combat game. Aliens have taken over outer space in order to conduct experiments on entire planets. Destroy them or they will destroy you.

reviewHighlights.text: It's not a bad game, it's a space shooting game in space, I recommend it to kill time.
